alert.note: Alert for Knox; Sullivan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 12:07AM EST until February 03 at 5:17PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at Covington...down to Riverton. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Wabash River at Lafayette. .Lowland flooding has developed along the Wabash from a combination of precipitation, snowmelt and additional rainfall on partially frozen ground. Minor flooding could be made worse by any ice jams that develop as river ice breaks up with the warmer temperatures and moves downstream. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY, FEBRUARY 03... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Saturday, February 03. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Extensive lowland flooding is in progress. High water surrounds many river cabins. Access to most river cabins is by boat only. Levees begin to protect farmland. Extensive flooding of Leaverton Park occurs in Palestine, Illinois. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 PM EST Thursday /10:00 PM CST Thursday/ the stage was 11.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 17.7 feet Thursday, February 01. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday, February 03. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement will be issued by Friday afternoon.this afternoon by around 100 PM EST /noon CST/.
